Installing¶

Pre-requisites¶

  • Docker (tested on version 18.03.1-ce)
  • docker-compose (tested on version 1.12.0)

Install locally with docker¶

For convenience, a very useful Makefile is available, so, to install it all, first, build de containers with:

make

After it, you can run the development environment, with debug tools (django debug toolbar, ipdb and DEBUG=True) available at port 8000:

make run-dev

Or, to run it with a production-like environment, available at port 80, type:

make run

Testing the application¶

To test the application using the Django test framework, type:

make test

Useful commands¶

  • Access the python shell:

    make shell

  • Rebuild the docs:

    make docs

  • Migrate the database:

    make migrate

  • Create a admin superuser:

    make superuser

  • Rebuild docker intances:

    make build
